dress_colors.name: red_outfit_zombie
dress_colors.prompt: A fierce anime-style female survivor striding down a ruined high school hallway turned zombie-infested fashion runway. She wears a blood-red, high-slit combat dress with ripped accents, a reinforced corset, and knee-high tactical boots. Her sharp eyes stare directly forward with perfect symmetry, glowing slightly under dim flickering lights. Her outfit is splattered with artistic blood patterns, blending horror with high fashion. The atmosphere is haunting, with overturned lockers, eerie shadows, and a faint mist creeping through the scene. Highly detailed anime rendering, smooth linework, cinematic lighting, dynamic pose.
dress_colors.negative_prompt: realistic, photorealistic, 3D render, pixelated, deformed face, asymmetrical eyes, bad anatomy, low quality, male characters, grotesque horror, overly dark lighting, chibi style

dress_colors.name: blue_outfit_zombie
dress_colors.prompt: A captivating anime-style female model striding down a ruined high school runway, her piercing symmetrical eyes locked forward, exuding deadly confidence. She wears a deep blue combat-ready dress with a stylish slit, reinforced straps, and elegant tactical gloves. Her polished boots crush scattered debris, and a bloodstained handkerchief dangles from her grasp as she walks. The background consists of a dilapidated gymnasium overtaken by the apocalypse, with flickering lights casting eerie reflections on the cracked floor. Highly detailed anime aesthetic, dynamic composition, smooth lighting transitions.

dress_colors.name: green_outfit_zombie
dress_colors.prompt: An intense anime-style female survivor walking the post-apocalyptic high school runway, her sharp emerald green eyes staring directly forward with perfect symmetry. She wears a battle-ready green ensemble—tactical ripped shorts, a cropped combat jacket, and knee-high armored boots. A katana is strapped to her side, gleaming under the cold emergency lights of the ruined hallway. The floor is littered with spent bullet casings and traces of past battles, adding to the eerie runway ambiance. Her expression is determined, her stride unwavering. Highly detailed anime rendering, fluid motion, cinematic shadows, and post-apocalyptic color grading.
